2875:29: none“> vaṁśe jātaḥ paramaguṇino bodhisattvasya tasya
2875:33: none“> cchāyāvan me sthitigatiśaye sāhacaryaṁ dadhānaḥ|
2875:37: none“> śvāno nāthe sadayahṛdayaḥ ślāghanīyaḥ kṛtajñair
2875:41: none“> jīvyād dīrghaṁ muditamanasā jantuvargaṁ prarakṣan||2||
2875:52: none“> yaṁ poṣati sma bhaṣakaṁ sutavatsalena|
2875:56: none“> duḥkhe sukhe ca sa samaprakṛtiḥ kṛtajñaḥ
2875:60: none“> svaṁ svāminaṁ na vijahāti kadā cid eva ||3||
2875:67: none“> paśyaṁś ca durbalajarāturam eṣa nāthaṁ
2875:71: none“> śokābhibhūta iva jṛmbhata eva bhūyaḥ|
2875:90: none“> jijñāsur eva kuśalaṁ sa nirāmayaṁ ca|
2875:113: none“> uttiṣṭhate bhramati kauti ca nirnimittaṁ
2875:136: none“> siṁhasya pota iva garjati dīrghadīrgham||7||
2875:147: none“> nidrāsukhaṁ na labhate svapatiṁ prarakṣan|
2875:155: none“> bambhramyate ca vimanā niśi jāgarūkaḥ||8||
2875:166: none“> tandrāṁ vihartum asakṛt sa vijṛmbhya kāyam|
2875:189: none“> gāḍhaṁ skhalan pathi mudhā gamanaṁ vidhatte
2875:212: none“> nītvā kadā cid akarot sukhitaṁ śrameṇa||11||
2875:223: none“> jñātvā pater upagatiṁ rabhasotthitaḥ san|
2875:227: none“> ūrdhvaṁ namet punar adho nipatec ca nāthaṁ
2875:231: none“> śliṣṭvā vicumbati virauti ca bhaktipūrvam||12||
2875:238: none“> nāthaḥ sakṛt pathi padaskhalanād visaṁjñam
2875:250: none“> ūrdhvaṁ punaḥ punar adhaḥ parivartate sma||
2875:258: none“> ekatra yaṣṭir aparatra ca tasya bhikṣā-
2875:270: none“> dūraṁ sasarja paritaḥ pathi tatra tatra|| 14||
2875:281: none“> naivāgataḥ parahito manujo'pi kaś cit|
2875:285: none“> śvāno muhar muhar itas tata eva dehe
2875:289: none“> cocumbyate sma vicarann abhitaḥ svanātham||15||
2875:304: none“> kokūyate sma śirasā bahudhā śarīram
2875:308: none“> utkṣiptum eva kurute sma guruprayatnam||16||
2875:323: none“> unnamya kandharaśiraṁ hy avikampya pucchaṁ
2875:327: none“> rorūyate sma na hi kaś cana saṁlalakṣa||17||
2875:334: none“> tasmān nirvartya sahasaiva mukhena yaṣṭim
2875:357: none“> prakṣālituṁ na hi śaśāka cireṇa kanthām|
2875:361: none“> prāyo mayāpi bhavatā ca jugupsitāṁ tāṁ
2875:365: none“> bho mā cucumbiṣasi samprati sārameya||19||
2875:376: none“> ācchādya pātram api hastatale niveśya|
2875:384: none“> āṭāṭyatādhvani punaḥ punar eṣa vṛddhaḥ||20||
2875:399: none“> nirgaccha kiṁ cid api no'tra tadā nimīlya
2875:403: none“> sāvajñam eṣa dhaniko jagade saroṣam||21||
2875:410: none“> tasmān nirvartya dhaninaḥ paruṣaṁ niśamya
2875:414: none“> śokārditaḥ śunakam ity avadad daridraḥ|
2875:418: none“> mā sārameya bhavatād vimanāḥ kathaṁ cid
2875:422: none“> āḍhyo'pi ditsati na kiṁ cana matsarī- hā||22||
2875:429: none“> naivāsti saṁcitadhanaṁ bhavanaṁ ca vastuṁ
2875:437: none“> kaupīnam eva vibhavo mama durgatasya
2875:441: none“> bandhuḥ sutaḥ parijanaś ca sakhā tvam eva||23||
2875:448: none“> sarvasvam asya hi lulopa paro nihīnaḥ
2875:452: none“> kārpaṇyam eva mama santakam adya jātam|
2875:460: none“> bhikṣākṛte pratidinaṁ hi tataś carāmi||24||
2875:479: none“> sarvasvam eva mama kukkura eva bandhuḥ||25||
2875:509: none“> na syāt kadā cid api satpuruṣaḥ kathaṁ cit|
2875:517: none“> sarpo na tṛpyati ca naiva bhavet kṛtajñaḥ||27||
2875:528: none“> chidraṁ nirūpayati hanty upakāriṇaṁ ca|
2875:532: none“> māṁsaṁ bubhukṣati pipāsati śoṇitaṁ ca
2875:536: none“> hā- durjanasya bhujagasya ca ko viśeṣaḥ||28||
2875:555: none“> bhoḥ śvan bhaved varatamā bhavato hi jātiḥ||29||
2875:562: none“> candro nihanti timiraṁ jagati prabhābhiḥ
2875:570: none“> tvaṁ me jahāsi hṛdi duḥkhatamaḥ prakṛtyā
2875:585: none“> ye vismaranty upakṛtiṁ hi yathā bhujaṅgāḥ|
2875:589: none“> jīvaṁ svakīyam api te vyasanaṁ nayanto
2875:623: none“> kṛtopakāraṁ na karoti yo janaḥ|
2875:680: none“> yo vismaret kṛtaguṇaṁ guṇināṁ praśastam|
2875:737: none“> kṛtajñatā yasya bhaven na cetasi|
2875:756: none“> śvāno nihatya karuṇaṁ bhuvi pucchamūlam|
2875:771: none“> bho bhoḥ kṛtañasuta kukkura mā śuśoca
2875:775: none“> bhuktāmiṣaṁ na jaṭhare pariṇāmam eti|
2875:817: none“> divi vā bhiṣajāṁ gaṇair api
2875:821: none“> na hi śakyāḥ śamituṁ kadā cana||43||
2875:923: none“> tridaśe bhuvi vā kadā cana
2875:927: none“> na tu kiṁ cid dhruvam asti śāśvatam|
2875:946: none“> mā mitra kukkura tathā vimanā bhava tvam|
2875:950: none“> ślāghyo bhavān bhavati sādhu kṛtopakāraṁ
2875:954: none“> hastastharatnam iva māṁ ca sadā rarakṣa||50||
2875:965: none“> mā bhūt kadā cid api te manujeṣu janma|
2875:973: none“> jivyāt sukhena suciraṁ jagato hitāya|| 51||
2875:984: none“> dādhāvyate sma savidhe bhiṣajo niketam|
2875:988: none“> leledhi tasya caraṇaṁ mukham īkṣamāṇaḥ
2875:992: none“> prāk pādayor nyapatad āśu viṣādapūrvam||52||
2875:999: none“> jajñe cikitsakavaro na hi kukkurasya
2875:1003: none“> sūkṣmeṅgitaṁ sa ca na taṁ gaṇayāṁ babhūva|
2875:1011: none“> āgamya deham asakṛt paritaś cucumba||53||
2875:1022: none“> prāṇān vihāya paralokam upāgataḥ saḥ|
2875:1026: none“> bhartur viyogam asahiṣṇur aho- kṛtajñaḥ
2875:1030: none“> śvāno vidīrya hṛdayaṁ ca tam anvagacchat||54||
2875:1045: none“> mā bhūd asādhuṣa kadā cana janma martye
2875:1049: none“> nirvāṇam eva bhavatād bhavato vimuktam||55||
2875:1060: none“> śvānastava iti khyātaprabandhaṁ kṛtavān imam||
